title: AVAPOW Car Jump Starter, 4000A Peak 27800mAh Battery Jump Starter (for All Gas or Up to 10L Diesel), Battery Booster Power Pack, 12V Auto Jump Box with LED Light, USB Quick Charge 3.0, 4000A peak current, includes 88Wh portable battery charger
descriptions:
AVAPOW Car Jump Starter – 4000A Peak, 27800 mAh

If you’ve ever dealt with a dead battery in the driveway or out on the road, this little powerhouse is a lifesaver. The AVAPOW jump starter delivers up to 4000A peak current and can start basically any gasoline engine and diesel engines up to 10L. It’s made for 12V vehicles and works great for cars, motorcycles, ATVs/UTVs, lawn mowers, and even snowmobiles. On a full charge, it can jump start up to about 40 times.

What I like about it:
- Big battery: 27,800 mAh (88Wh) so it’s not just for jump starting—you can charge phones, tablets, and other gadgets too.
- Fast charging: USB Quick Charge 3.0 outputs (5V/3A, 9V/2A, 12V/1.5A) plus a 5V/2.4A port. There’s also a Type-C port that works as both input and output, so one cable does double duty. It charges devices up to 75% faster than a regular power bank.
- Built-in LED light with flashlight, SOS, and strobe modes—handy for night roadside situations.
- Safety features: intelligent protection against short circuit, low battery, high temperature, and reverse connection. The rugged design and solid metal clamps make it feel durable and secure to use.
- Portable: compact and easy to keep in the trunk with the included carry case.

What’s in the box:
- Portable Battery Starter
- Jumper Cables
- USB-C Cable
- Cigarette Lighter Converter
- Carry Case
- User Manual

Notes:
- Works on 12V systems only.
- Wall adapter is not included (you can charge via your own USB charger or in-car charger).
- Backed by a 24-hour online after-sales support team if you need help.

If you want peace of mind for road trips or just a reliable backup for your daily driver, this AVAPOW jump starter is a solid pick that’s easy to use and carry around.
